Narrator.intro2: You wake up in a dark and unfamiliar forest...
Narrator.intro3: You donâ€™t know how you ended up here.
Narrator.intro4: You notice a knife, damaged and rusty, and a reddish potion nearby.
Narrator.intro5: You hear strange noises around you.
Narrator.intro6: You take the knife and the potion and stand up.
Narrator.intro7: Suddenly, a loud noise echoes around you!
Narrator.intro8: You realize you're not alone in this forest...
Narrator.intro9: I think it will be difficult to survive here and leave this forest...
